thread.section_title: PartsGeek Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PartsGeek | www.partsgeek.com | 7 of 5982
thread.title: Will S.

author: Will S.
title: Will S.
text:
I was in a hurry and ordered the right side window regulator replacement part instead of the left. I immediately I realized what I had done and telephoned Parts Geek. I eventually got through to Raymond. Raymond was extremely helpful and righted my wrong. This was between 2pm and 3pm that day I received the correct part by 4pm the very next day (standard shipping) !
Thanks Ray
